name: Spider Solitaire HD 2
description:
Second edition of our best solitaire - Spider Solitaire HD - with new graphics, clean and bigger cards and great gameplay.

Rules:
- clicking on piles on the right deals new cards,
- you have to build sequences from King to Ace,
- moving requires the card to be in sequence and follow suit,
- you can drop cards on a one point higher card (10,9,8,7 on jack)

Features:
- autosave, you don't need to worry when a phone calls interupting your game,
- 1, 2 and 4 suit variations,
- score,
- undo,
- moving of cards designed for touch screens (you can move whole pile even if you need to only move one card!),
- smooth animations,
- high resolution graphics for tablets and large phones.

Tips and Tricks:
- cherish empty spaces,
- use undo when playing 2 and 4 suit variations.

If you have any problems - contact us, we fix issues as fast as we can.
